c74object.name: sy.transform
c74object.digest: Perform translitterations and more general text transformation
c74object.description: Performs a wide range of transformations on incoming text, including case change, normalization, and translitteration.

objarg.name: instructions
objarg.description: The optional argument sets the value for the "mode" attribute. This can be either the integer value of the attribute, or one of the following symbols: "NFD", "NFKD", "NFC", "NFKC", "FCD".

method.name: anything
method.description: Transforms each individual symbol in the incoming list and outputs the result.

method.name: bang
method.description: Performs the transformation on the most recently received input list.

method.name: getlist
method.description: Outputs all the allowed transformations from the right outlet.

attribute.name: instr
attribute.description: Sets the output string format. Choose among the list at http://demo.icu-project.org/icu-bin/convexp (case insensitive).

attribute.name: listout
maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

numout
